To view a course report:

  1. Use the Change report drop down list to choose View Course reports.
  2. You can filter the list to display either courses for your Teaching Groups or all groups in the organisation.
  3. Click on the course names to open the lists of groups.
  4. Click on the name of the group and a list of their reports will appear in the right hand panel.
  5. Click on the report icon (bar chart) to view the report.
